text: phir shaitaan ne un donon ko vasavasa (shak) dilaaya taaki (naapharamaanee kee vajah se) unake astar kee cheeze jo unakee nazar se behashtee libaas kee vajah se posheeda thee khol daale kahane laga ki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne donon ko darakht (ke phal khaane) se sirph isalie mana kiya hai (ki mubaada) tum donon pharishte ban jao ya hamesha (zinda) rah jao
